values.description: If you buy an Option contract, you can exercise your right to buy or sell the underlying asset at the strike price, but you don't need to exercise it.
values.keywords: buy an Option contract, strike price, out of the money, American-style Option contracts, exercise European-style Option contracts, ExerciseOption method, order properties, order fill modeling, order ticket, order timeout period, send asynchronous orders
values.og:description: If you buy an Option contract, you can exercise your right to buy or sell the underlying asset at the strike price, but you don't need to exercise it.
